titleStmt.title: Follie's anatomie. Or Satyres and satyricall epigrams VVith a compendious history of Ixion's wheele. Compiled by Henry Hutton, Dunelmensis.
titleStmt.author: Hutton, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Mathew Walbanke, and are to be sold at his shop at Graies-Inne Gate,

notesStmt.note: "Satyricall epigrams" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
